extendedInfo.description: The all-new myCigna Mobile App gives you a simple way to personalize, organize and access your important health information â on the go.* It puts you in control of your health, so you can get more out of life. Your Health Has Met Its Appâ .little app. BIG FEATURES. Health Care Professional Directory â¢ Search for a doctor, dentist, pharmacy or health care facility from Cignaâs national network and compare quality-of-care ratings ID Cards â¢ Quickly view ID cards (front and back) for entire family â¢ Easily print, email or scan right from smartphone Claims â¢ View and search recent and past claims â¢ Bookmark and group claims for easy reference Drug Search â¢ Look up and compare actual costs at 60,000 pharmacies nationwide â¢ Find closest pharmacy location using GPS â¢ Speed-dial Cigna Home Delivery PharmacySM Account Balances â¢ Access and view health fund balances â¢ Review plan deductibles and maximums Coverageâ¢ View plan coverage and authorizationsâ¢ Learn whatâs covered under your plan Health Wallet â¢ Organize and manage all the health information you use mostâ¢ Store your biometric information (cholesterol, blood pressure, allergies and medications)â¢ Save contact information and build your personal contact list with the doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, emergency rooms, and other health care professionals and facilities you may call frequentlySafe & Secure â¢ We use the latest technology in secure mobile applications to protect your personal health info while online or off. The all-new myCigna Mobile App. Your health has met its app. *You must be a Cigna customer to use the secure myCigna mobile app. Features available are based on coverage you have with Cigna. About Cigna More than just an insurance company, Cigna is a global health service company â dedicated to helping the people we serve improve their health, well-being and sense of security. We make this happen through a broad range of integrated health care and related plans and services, and proven health and well-being programs that are targeted to the unique needs of our customers, clients and partners.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.comment: All pertinate medical information about coverage is now at your fingertips. Very user friendly. Love having this app especially since I always have my phone handy and not always my insurance cards!
reviews.author: Ashley Stewart

reviews.title: Where\'s my Vision??
reviews.comment: Add coverage for Cigna Vision onto the app and I\'ll be one satisfied EE/customer and will add the 5th star ;) overall great app!!!
reviews.author: Angela Woodson

reviews.comment: Awesom app. Allows me to monitor and track everything about my health coverage. And much easier to find service numbers to call\tI recommend this app for anyone looking to stay current with their health insurance.
reviews.author: Dean Alcover

reviews.title: Can\'t log in.
reviews.comment: I can log into the web site without issue. Mobile app says incorrect login.
reviews.author: Tim Pilger

reviews.title: Zip code
reviews.comment: This app is a waste if time. It will not accept any zip code. The only thing that works is tge id card. Please fix.
reviews.author: Dustin Norrell

reviews.title: disappointed
reviews.comment: This app sucks. The whole point of me downloading this app was so I could pay my bill but I don\'t see that option anywhere in the app
reviews.author: Angelique Rivera

reviews.title: Grrr....
reviews.comment: Can\'t log in. Used my username/password and tells me not available.
reviews.author: bonnie vogel

reviews.title: No option for STD/LTD claims
reviews.comment: Waste of time.  There is no option to provide you with information about STD/LTD claims.  Need to incorporate that into the app and it would be perfect.
reviews.author: Yvette Butler

reviews.title: This app is worthless
reviews.comment: Updated last week and it doesn\'t open. Emailed Cigna right after and still no response.
reviews.author: sean mcmullen

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: It will not use my location, nor will it accept my zip code to find providers.
reviews.author: Paul Nethercott

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app! Love that I can view claims, my member ID, and so much more! Great job
reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

reviews.title: Emm
reviews.comment: Cannot access site at all, useless...
reviews.author: Marina Perez

reviews.comment: Does not show account balance. Also when you try to look up a Dr in your area it doesn\'t show any
reviews.author: Tonya Pelter

reviews.title: Fairly good
reviews.comment: Good info on claims and helpful for ID card retrieval.   Wallet contacts feature not working unfortunately.
reviews.author: Paul Larsen

reviews.title: Blablabla
reviews.comment: Told me to update.Now the app will not open!!!.  Wtf
reviews.author: Larry Lentz

reviews.title: No wellness stuff
reviews.comment: Thought this would be at least half as goof as Kaiser\'s app.   I was wrong.
reviews.author: Kevin Panet

reviews.title: Junk!
reviews.comment: Absolutely nothing in this app works!!
reviews.author: Paul Green
